Text: can u seed this for me

I'm having a problem with file size. it says "Torrent Error
File: Overlord.iso
File exceeds file system size limit"
is there a way that I can up the limit or do I need to wait until I'm done with some other torrents in order to proceed?

its your hard drive file system thats the problem ... fat32 have a 1 gb file size limit ... either format the drive with ntfs or save the file to a ntfs formatted hard drive (it can be done in the download options for the file)
